content.html:
SHOOTING SETTING (Still Photography)


Adjust shooting options for still photography.

To display shooting settings, press MENU/OK
in the photo shooting display and select
the � (SHOOTING SETTING) tab.


SHOOTING SETTING 1 /3
I.Q.SPORTS FINDER MODE ▶
MFPRE-SHOT ES 입
SELF-TIMER
↓SAVE SELF-TIMER SETTING
SELF-TIMER LAMP
INTERVAL TIMER SHOOTING
8INTERVAL TIMER SHOOTING EXPOSURE SMOOTHING
MYAE BKT SETTING BACK EXIT

SPORTS FINDER MODE


Take pictures using the crop in the center
of the display. Choose this option for pic-
tures of athletes, birds, and other moving
subjects.


OptionDescription
ONPictures are taken using a 1.25x crop, reducing the picture angle by an amount equivalent to increasing lens focal length by 1.25x; the crop is shown by a frame in the display.
OFFThe 1.25x crop is disabled.

● The I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > IMAGE SIZE item in the shoot-
ing menu is fixed at M
● The sports finder is not available in modes that offer an electronic
shutter.

140

Shooting

content.markdown:
# SHOOTING SETTING (Still Photography)

# Adjust shooting options for still photography.

To display shooting settings, press MENU/OK
in the photo shooting display and select
the � (SHOOTING SETTING) tab.

| SHOOTING SETTING 1 /3 | SHOOTING SETTING 1 /3 |
| --- | --- |
| I.Q. | SPORTS FINDER MODE ▶ |
| MF | PRE-SHOT ES 입 |
|  | SELF-TIMER |
| ↓ | SAVE SELF-TIMER SETTING |
|  | SELF-TIMER LAMP |
|  | INTERVAL TIMER SHOOTING |
| 8 | INTERVAL TIMER SHOOTING EXPOSURE SMOOTHING |
| MY | AE BKT SETTING BACK EXIT |


SPORTS FINDER MODE

Take pictures using the crop in the center
of the display. Choose this option for pic-
tures of athletes, birds, and other moving
subjects.

![image](/image/placeholder)
ROP 
1 25x 
M 


| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| ON | Pictures are taken using a 1.25x crop, reducing the picture angle by an amount equivalent to increasing lens focal length by 1.25x; the crop is shown by a frame in the display. |
| OFF | The 1.25x crop is disabled. |


- ● The I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > IMAGE SIZE item in the shoot-
- ing menu is fixed at M 
- ● The sports finder is not available in modes that offer an electronic
- shutter.


140

The
Shooting
Menus
